text: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ guizbangɨra mɨgɨa ghaze, Kɨ Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiam gasɨghasɨghasa nɨghnigha gɨfa. Kɨ ua deraghvɨra a damuan aghua. Kɨ Babilonɨn atrivimɨn amamangatɨghtɨ, a nguibar ekiar kam inigh uan mɨdorozir gumazibav kemeghtɨ, me a daboroghtɨ, a bar moghɨra isigh ikuvigh puvatɨgham.’ ”
